channel.title: Blog
channel.description: Welcome to the blog of the module. Here I will post news and ideas. Please, subscribe to the RSS feed to be always aware of what is happening!

item.title: Start of Lectures for the Intelligent Web Module
item.description:
Lectures will start on the 8th of February and will be held in MAPP-LT03, Mappin Building between 11.00 - 12.50.

Please note: participation in lectures and lab classes is mandatory.

item.title: Start of Lab Classes
item.description:
The Lab Classes will start during week 2 on the 15th of February at 3pm RC-G12. Please be there!

Please note: participation in lectures and lab classes is mandatory.
